short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Extracts STEAM WEBAPI TOKEN from Steam Profile page.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Some pages requires the user to extract the data-loyalty_webapi_token from the Steam profile page to authenticate. This plugin simplifies the extraction of the value so it can be done without going into the code on the profile page and search for it.
